responses.rationale: Reports factual information about past outbreaks, not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports factual information about deaths and an investigation being sparked, not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports factual information about cases and symptoms, not capabilities or preparedness.
Describes a procedural action taken ('has reported the matter to the WHO') without active reassurance.
States a factual outcome ('turned out to be mild'), not capabilities or preparedness.
States a factual assessment of risk level ('risk... appears low'), not capabilities or preparedness.
States a factual assessment of risk level ('considered to be at low risk'), not capabilities or preparedness.
States a factual expectation about future exposure, not capabilities or preparedness.
Describes response actions taken ('captured five other birds and sent them') without active reassurance.

Reports factual information about case locations, not capabilities or preparedness.

Reports factual information about an event location and trigger, not capabilities or preparedness.

Describes a hopeful future possibility ('new cases... are expected to stop') contingent on actions ('takes all the right precautions').
